data.eml:eml: A new synonym of Neomida luteonotata (Pic, 1926) (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Diaperini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aloquio, Sergio, Flores, Gustavo E., Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano (2017): A new synonym of Neomida luteonotata (Pic, 1926) (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Diaperini). Zootaxa 4300 (3): 438-440, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4300.3.6
